item.title: Valerie add a quote by Pat Conroy
item.description: "You get a little moody sometimes but I think that's because you like to read. People that like to read are always a little fucked up." -- Pat Conroy

item.title: Valerie add a quote by Courtney Summers
item.description: "I've been variations of hurt my whole life." -- Courtney Summers

item.title: Valerie add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "We love the things we love for what they are." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Valerie add a quote by Courtney Summers
Valerie add a quote by Courtney Summers
item.description: "Maybe the only way our story can end is varying degrees of sad." -- Courtney Summers

item.title: Valerie add a quote by John Green
item.description: "You don't get to choose if you get hurt in this world...but you do have some say in who hurts you. I like my choices." -- John Green

item.title: Valerie add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Valerie add a quote by Ally Carter
item.description: "I thought about how there are two types of secrets: the kind you <i>want</i> to keep in, and the kind you don't <i>dare</i> to let out." -- Ally Carter

item.title: Valerie add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "I hope that in this year to come, you make mistakes. Because if you are making mistakes...you're Doing Something." -- Neil Gaiman
